AT.name: NightSky
AT.description: NightSky ist ein Action-Puzzlespiel, das eine für den Nintendo 3DS™ einzigartige Spielerfahrung bietet. Versuche dich an kniffligen Herausforderungen, die es in unnachahmlichen, malerischen Welten zu entdecken gibt. Jede Welt ist in verschiedene Gebiete unterteilt, in denen du eine Kugel mithilfe von realistischer Physik bewegen musst, um voranzukommen. Es gibt weder Gegner, Endgegner noch Gewalt in NightSky. Diese intuitive Spielerfahrung spricht Gelegenheits- und Mainstreamspieler an. NightSky bietet mit einem freischaltbaren Alternativ-Modus außerdem eine schwierige Herausforderung für Hardcore-Spieler. Der Original-Soundtrack des experimentellen Jazz-Musikers Chris Schlarb trägt zur Intensivierung der surrealen 3D-Erfahrung bei.

AU.name: NightSky
AU.description: NightSky is an action-puzzle game that offers an ambient gameplay experience unlike any other on Nintendo 3DS™ with cerebral challenges that fill uniquely designed picturesque worlds. Each of these worlds is broken into different areas in which the player must manoeuver a sphere by using realistic physics to advance. There are no enemies, no bosses, and no violence in NightSky. An intuitive experience is friendly for casual and mainstream gamers. NightSky also offers a formidable challenge for hardcore players, with an unlockable Alternative mode. The original soundtrack by experimental jazz musician Chris Schlarb will further heighten the surreal 3D experience.

BG.name: NightSky

The original soundtrack by experimental jazz musician Chris Schlarb will further heighten the surreal 3D experience.

BE.name: NightSky
BE.description: NightSky est un jeu d’action et de réflexion qui se distingue du reste du catalogue Nintendo 3DS™ par son gameplay calme et relaxant. Venez à bout de nombreuses énigmes en explorant des mondes nimbés d’une lueur crépusculaire. Chaque monde est séparé en plusieurs zones que le joueur doit traverser en dirigeant une sphère. NightSky tire parti d’un moteur physique réaliste et ne comporte aucun ennemi, aucun boss et aucune forme de violence. NightSky est un titre à la maniabilité intuitive qui saura satisfaire les vétérans et les débutants. Un mode Alternatif est d’ailleurs disponible pour les joueurs confirmés qui souhaiteraient trouver un défi à la hauteur de leur talent. La bande-son composée par l’artiste de jazz expérimental Chris Schlarb confère une touche surréaliste à ce titre résolument atypique.

ES.name: NightSky
ES.description: NightSky es un puzle de acción que ofrece un ambiente de juego diferente a cualquier otro juego de Nintendo 3DS™, con desafíos mentales que encajan a la perfección en unos mundos muy pintorescos dotados de un diseño exclusivo. Cada uno de estos mundos está dividido en áreas diferentes, en las que el jugador deberá controlar una esfera utilizando elementos físicos realistas para poder avanzar. En NightSky no hay enemigos, ni jefes, ni violencia. Una experiencia intuitiva es algo que buscan tanto los jugadores casuales como los veteranos. NightSky también ofrece un desafío formidable para los jugadores más curtidos, con un modo Alternativo desbloqueable. La banda sonora original del músico de jazz experimental Chris Schlarb ensalza aún más la experiencia surrealista en 3D.

IT.name: NightSky
IT.description: NightSky è un puzzle d’azione caratterizzato da scenari mai visti in nessun altro gioco Nintendo 3DS™, in cui il tuo intelletto sarà messo alla prova in mondi pittoreschi. Questi ultimi sono suddivisi in diverse aree e, per avanzare nel gioco, dovrai manovrare una sfera servendoti delle leggi della fisica. Nei mondi di NightSky non esistono nemici, boss o violenza. NightSky è un’esperienza di gioco intuitiva e divertente sia per giocatori accaniti che occasionali. Sbloccando la modalità Alternativa, anche i giocatori più esperti avranno del filo da torcere. Questa esperienza surreale in 3D è ulteriormente arricchita dall’originale colonna sonora di Chris Schlarb, musicista jazz sperimentale.

NL.name: NightSky
NL.description: Nightsky is een puzzelspel vol actie dat een spelervaring biedt zoals geen ander spel voor Nintendo 3DS™ dat kan. Unieke pittoreske werelden vormen het toneel voor breinbrekende uitdagingen. Elk van de werelden is onderverdeeld in verschillende gebieden die voltooid moeten worden door met realistische natuurkundige effecten een bol te besturen. Nightsky kent geen vijanden, geen eindbazen en geen geweld. Een intuïtieve ervaring is iets dat iedereen begrijpt, onafhankelijk van ervaring met het spelen van spellen. Met de vrij te spelen Alternative mode biedt Nightsky tevens een formidabele uitdaging voor fanatieke spelers. De originele soundtrack van experimenteel jazzmuzikant Chris Schlarb maakt de surrealistische 3D-ervaring helemaal af.

NZ.name: NightSky
NZ.description: NightSky is an action-puzzle game that offers an ambient gameplay experience unlike any other on Nintendo 3DS™ with cerebral challenges that fill uniquely designed picturesque worlds. Each of these worlds is broken into different areas in which the player must manoeuver a sphere by using realistic physics to advance. There are no enemies, no bosses, and no violence in NightSky. PL.name: NightSky
PL.description: NightSky is an action-puzzle game that offers an ambient gameplay experience unlike any other on Nintendo 3DS™ with cerebral challenges that fill uniquely designed picturesque worlds. Each of these worlds is broken into different areas in which the player must manoeuver a sphere by using realistic physics to advance. There are no enemies, no bosses, and no violence in NightSky. An intuitive experience is friendly for casual and mainstream gamers. NightSky also offers a formidable challenge for hardcore players, with an unlockable Alternative mode. PT.name: NightSky
PT.description: NightSky é um jogo de puzzle e ação que oferece uma experiência de jogabilidade inédita na Nintendo 3DS™. Os desafios de raciocínio presentes encaixam-se perfeitamente nos mundos pitorescos do jogo. Todos esses mundos são divididos em diferentes áreas onde o jogador tem de controlar uma esfera utilizando física realista para prosseguir. Não há inimigos, vilões nem violência em NightSky. NightSky é uma experiência intuitiva e amigável para jogadores casuais, mas também pode ser um desafio formidável para jogadores experientes devido ao modo Alternativo desbloqueável. A banda sonora original composta pelo músico de jazz experimental Chris Schlarb aprofundará ainda mais a surreal experiência 3D do jogador.

RU.name: NightSky
RU.description: NightSky — это единственная в своем роде смесь экшна и головоломки для Nintendo 3DS™. Вас ждут логические задачки, уникальная атмосфера и потрясающий дизайн игровых миров. В вашем распоряжении — всего лишь один шарик, который нужно провести по всем уровням, используя смекалку и знание законов физики. В NightSky вы не встретите ни противников, ни монстров — в игре нет абсолютно никакого насилия. Интуитивно понятное управление придется по душе как фанатам казуальных игр, так и тем, кто любит игры посложнее. Для экспертов в NightSky создан альтернативный режим повышенной сложности, доступ к которому можно получить в процессе игры. А саундтрек в стиле экспериментального джаза, написанный Крисом Шларбом (Chris Schlarb), поможет вам с головой погрузиться в сюрреалистический трехмерный мир NightSky.

SE.description: NightSky is an action-puzzle game that offers an ambient gameplay experience unlike any other on Nintendo 3DS™ with cerebral challenges that fill uniquely designed picturesque worlds. Each of these worlds is broken into different areas in which the player must manoeuver a sphere by using realistic physics to advance. There are no enemies, no bosses, and no violence in NightSky.
